string.text: Pistol cartridge with a bullet of increased penetration. Based off of the SP10 cartridge, this unique bullet has increased penetration due to the use of fire-based artefacts when crafted. Due to the volatility of artefacts, these rounds put slightly increased wear on the weapon.

Pistol cartridge with a bullet of increased penetration. This cartridge acts a midway point between the standard SP10 and SP11. These rounds boast great penetration power with the stopping power close to the standard SP12 rounds.

Specialty-crafted variant of the standad SP12 rounds. Despite this cartridge's low penetration to body armor, it boasts devastating power when hitting a target in the head. As such, users will want to ensure their aim is true with this round. Due to this power, this round puts extreme pressure on the weapon compared to other 9x21 rounds.
